00038   class ShellGeometry 
00039   {
00040   private:
00041     vector<Vector3d>  _a;
00042     vector<Vector3d>  _aPartials;
00043     Vector3d          _d;
00044     vector<Vector3d>  _dPartials;
00045     vector<Vector3d>  _aDual;
00046     vector<Vector3d>  _aDualPartials;
00047     vector<Matrix2d> _GammaM_ij;
00048 
00049     Matrix2d _metricTensor;
00050     Matrix2d _metricTensorInverse;
00051 
00052     double _metric;
00053     double _metricInverse;
00054         
00055   public:
00056     // Default Constructor
00057     ShellGeometry() {
00058       _a.resize(2, Vector3d::Zero()); // (a_1, a_2)
00059       _aPartials.resize(3, Vector3d::Zero()); // (a_11, a_22, a_12)
00060       _d = Vector3d::Zero(); // d
00061       _dPartials.resize(2, Vector3d::Zero()); // (d_1, d_2)
00062       _aDual.resize(2, Vector3d::Zero()); // (a^1, a^2)
00063       _aDualPartials.resize(4, Vector3d::Zero()); // (a^1_1, a^2_2, a^1_2, a^2_1)
00064       _GammaM_ij.resize(2,Matrix2d::Zero());
00065       _metricTensor << 
00066     0.0, 0.0,
00067     0.0, 0.0;
00068       _metricTensorInverse <<
00069     0.0, 0.0,
00070     0.0, 0.0;
00071       _metric = 0.0;
00072       _metricInverse = 0.0;
00073       
00074     };
00075     
00077     ShellGeometry( const vector<Vector3d> & a, 
00078            const vector<Vector3d> & aPartials ) {
00079       update( a, aPartials );
00080     }
00081     
00082     void update( const  vector<Vector3d> &  a,
00083          const  vector<Vector3d> & aPartials ) {
00084       // recompute everything from a and aPartials 
00085     
00086       _a = a;
00087       _aPartials = aPartials;
00088       _d = Vector3d::Zero(); // d
00089       _dPartials.resize(2, Vector3d::Zero()); // (d_1, d_2)
00090       _aDual.resize(2, Vector3d::Zero()); // (a^1, a^2)
00091       _aDualPartials.resize(4, Vector3d::Zero()); // (a^1_1, a^2_2, a^1_2, a^2_1)
00092       _metricTensor << 
00093     0.0, 0.0,
00094     0.0, 0.0;
00095       _metricTensorInverse <<
00096     0.0, 0.0,
00097     0.0, 0.0;
00098       _metric = 0.0;
00099       _metricInverse = 0.0;
00100       _GammaM_ij.resize(2,Matrix2d::Zero());
00101 
00102       _updateMetrics();
00103       _updateDual();
00104       _updateDirector();
00105       _updateDirectorPartials();
00106       _updateDualPartials();
00107       _updateGamma();
00108     }
00109 
00110     const vector<Vector3d> &   a()     const {return _a;}
00111     const vector<Vector3d> & aPartials() const {return _aPartials;}
00112     const Vector3d &               d()     const {return _d;}
00113     const vector<Vector3d> &   dPartials() const {return _dPartials;}
00114     const vector<Vector3d> &   aDual()     const {return _aDual;}
00115     const vector<Vector3d> & aDualPartials() const {return _aDualPartials;}
00116

00118     const Matrix2d & metricTensorInverse() const {return _metricTensorInverse;}
00119     const vector<Matrix2d> & GammaM_ij() const{return _GammaM_ij;}
00120     const Vector2d gklGammaI_kl();
00121 
00122     double metric() const  {return _metric;}
00123     double metricInverse() const {return _metricInverse;}
00124         
00126     ShellGeometry& operator = ( const ShellGeometry& g );
00127

00130     void _updateDual();

00132     void _updateDualPartials();
